title: Sasikala vs Panneerselvam: OPS begins day with an advantage, 2 more AIADMK MPs flock to his camp : India, News - India Today
text:
India Sasikala vs Panneerselvam: OPS begins day with an advantage, 2 more AIADMK MPs flock to his camp Two more MPs have joined the Panneerselvam camp, which had seen support grow on Saturday. Sasikala, meanwhile, has vowed to carry out a new form of protest today. Stay tuned for live updates. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Dev Goswami A + A - Sasikala and Panneerselvam 
O Panneerselvam began Sunday on a happy note with two more AIADMK MPs extending their support to the caretaker chief minister of Tamil Nadu. Vellore MP Senguttuvan and Tuthukudi MP Jaisingh both switched to Team Panneerselvam even as VK Sasikala has promised to undertake a new form of protest today. 
Meanwhile, a complaint has been filed with the Tamil Nadu police alleging that the state agriculture minister has gone missing and that the Sasikala family is hiding the minister. 
Latest developments of the day: Vellore MP Senguttuvan and Tuthukudi MP Jaisingh extend their support to Panneerselvam. The former minister refused to comment on the agriculture minister R Duraikannu going missing. Jaipal expressed confidence that OPS would win a majority in a floor test in the Assembly. Former Fisheries Minister K Jaipal told India Today that every person in Tamil Nadu, particularly the women are in support of Panneerselvam. For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
